snippet: DALY--Nancy R.,79, died peacefully on February 14 at the Dawn Greene Hospice at Mary Manning Walsh. Nancy worked 25 years teaching in the NYC school system. After retiring she worked part time at PS 41, District 2, sharing her computer expertise with teachers and administrators. Nancy was an avid bridge player who loved to travel and to attend the Philharmonic. Daughter of the late Charles and Hannah (nee Shea) and sister of the late Patricia Mast. Reposing at the John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Avenue (70 St.). Visiting Wednesday, February 17, from 2 to 4pm and 7 to 9pm. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday, February 18 at 10am at St. Monica's R.C. Church, 413 East 79 Street. In lieu of flowers, please donate to the St. Francis Breadline or a charity of your choice. 1/3
